name: Out Of Sync (outofsync)
description:
Out of Sync is a first-person puzzle game set in an alternative dystopian world. Make your way through a series of rooms, each with a unique puzzle based on perspective. Our goal is to delight and surprise the players constantly and let each room add a unique piece of the story. Out of sync will be a highly immersive and solitary experience where paying attention to every single detail will be paramount to solving the puzzles and uncovering the mystery.

Left Stick - WASD: Character Movement

Right Stick - Mouse: AIM and Camera Movement

A - Space: Jump

LT - Left Shift (HOLD): Run

RT - E: Action

Start -M: Pause
